title: Quality Evaluation and Critical Utilization Strategies for Mathematics Education Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Core secondary mathematics concepts and experience with textbook utilization
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of smartphone-based data analysis and offline collaborative activities in limited technology environments

learning_goals: Identify and evaluate at least three qualitative elements of mathematics textbooks.
Collaborate with peers and experts to produce a report critically analyzing the appropriateness of educational materials.

Learners can evaluate the practicality of three science/math materials using two educational apps in a limited technological environment (low-spec smartphones, offline conditions) within one week and complete a checklist (usability, accessibility, effectiveness) with over 80% fulfillment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
